value.string:
from Products.CMFActivity.ActiveResult import ActiveResult
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 web_site_module = getattr(portal, 'web_site_module', None)
 if web_site_module is None:
 # web_site_module is not present yet, so it is impossible
 # to keep the promise
 return False
 
 shacache = getattr(web_site_module, 'shacache', None)
 shadir = getattr(web_site_module, 'shadir', None)
 
 active_result = ActiveResult()
 if shacache is None:
 severity = 1
 summary = "Shacache WebSite do not exist"
 detail = ""
 elif shadir is None:
 severity = 1
 summary = "Shadir WebSite do not exist"
 detail = ""
 elif shacache.getSkinSelectionName() != "SHACACHE":
 severity = 1
 summary = "shacache site don't have SHACACHE as skin selection name"
 detail = ""
 elif shadir.getSkinSelectionName() != "SHADIR":
 severity = 1
 summary = "shadir site don't have SHADIR as skin selection name"
 detail = ""
 elif shacache.getValidationState() != "published":
 severity = 1
 summary = "shacache site is not published"
 detail = ""
 elif shadir.getValidationState() != "published":
 severity = 1
 summary = "shadir site is not published"
 detail = ""
 else:
 severity = 0
 summary = "Nothing to do."
 detail = ""
 
 active_result.edit(
 summary=summary, 
 severity=severity,
 detail=detail)
 
 context.newActiveProcess().postResult(active_result)
